uma_musume.name: Agnes Tachyon
uma_musume.description: If you're near the front during a corner in the second half of the race, your speed will increase and your stamina will recover.
condition: - Race is in its half or later
- You're currently first, second, or third

uma_musume.name: Agnes Digital
uma_musume.description: If you overtake others at least twice at the end of the race, your speed will increase.
condition: - You have overtaken another girl at least 3 times since entering the Late-Race.
effect: - Increase Target Speed (0.35) & Increase Lane Movement Speed (0.035)

uma_musume.name: Air Groove
uma_musume.description: If you're not in the front during the Final Corner and are passing someone, your speed will increase.
condition: - U're currently on the last corner or beyond it.
- U're currently first, second, or third.

uma_musume.name: Air Groove (Wedding)
uma_musume.description: If you're near the front during the mid-race and try to overtake someone, your speed will increase.

uma_musume.name: Biwa Hayahide
uma_musume.description: Increase velocity by deriving the winning equation when passing another runner toward the front on the final corner or later.

uma_musume.name: Curren Chan
uma_musume.description: Gain momentum and begin to advance when passing another runner while well-positioned around halfway through the race.

uma_musume.name: Daiwa Scarlet
uma_musume.description: If you're competing for the first position during the second half of the race, your speed and acceleration will increase.

uma_musume.name: Eishin Flash
uma_musume.description: Increase velocity in a dash for the lead after running calmly and according to plan up until the final straight.

uma_musume.name: El Condor Pasa
uma_musume.description: Hang onto the advantage when positioned toward the front with energy to spare on the final straight.

uma_musume.name: El Condor Pasa (Fantasy)
uma_musume.description: During the last corner, gain acceleration when aiming for the lead from the middle of the pack

uma_musume.name: Fuji Kiseki
uma_musume.description: Greatly increase velocity with a dazzling display when just breaking out of the pack toward the front on the final straight.

uma_musume.name: Gold City
uma_musume.description: Moderately increase acceleration steadily with a wink when starting to make a move from midpack in the second half of the race.

uma_musume.name: Gold City (Festival)
uma_musume.description: If you're blocked in the middle of the pack at the final corner, it will become easier to get out.

uma_musume.name: Gold Ship
uma_musume.description: If you're in the second half of the pack halfway through the race, your speed will increase.

uma_musume.name: Grass Wonder
unique_skills: Where There's a Will, There's a Way
uma_musume.description: Increase velocity with a strong turn of foot when passing another runner toward the back on the final straight.

uma_musume.name: Grass Wonder (Fantasy)
uma_musume.description: During the mid-race, if you're not in the front and someone overtakes you, your stamina will greatly recover.

uma_musume.name: Haru Urara
uma_musume.description: When in the back in last corner, restore your stamina when you see another girl.

uma_musume.name: Hishi Akebono
uma_musume.description: Kick forward hard with renewed vigor when starting to get tired while well-positioned halfway through the race.

uma_musume.name: Hishi Amazon
uma_musume.description: Increase velocity on the final straight after passing another runner on the outside toward the back on the final corner or later.

uma_musume.name: Kawakami Princess
uma_musume.description: Increase velocity with pretty princess power when engaged in a challenge on the final straight.

uma_musume.name: King Halo
uma_musume.description: After proceeding through the race calmly, your speed drastically increases during the last 200m

uma_musume.name: Manhattan Cafe
uma_musume.description: If you're in the middle of the pack in the second half of the race, your speed will increase while draining the speed of the girls ahead of you.

uma_musume.name: Maruzensky
uma_musume.description: If you're in the first half of the pack (and not worse than 5th) on the Final Corner or beyond, your acceleration will increase.

uma_musume.name: Maruzensky (Summer)
uma_musume.description: In the second half of the race, increase speed when you recover stamina with your skills while being in front.

uma_musume.name: Matikanefukukitaru
unique_skills: I See Victory in My Future!
uma_musume.description: When the front is packed during the late-race of the race, the oracle's power will open a path.

uma_musume.name: Matikanefukukitaru (Full Armor)
uma_musume.description: During the second half of the race, if you're not in the front and someone is trying to overtake you, your speed will increase.

uma_musume.name: Mayano Top Gun
uma_musume.description: If you're competing for the lead on the Final Corner or beyond, your speed and acceleration will increase.

uma_musume.name: Mayano Top Gun (Wedding)
uma_musume.description: Increase velocity when passing another runner toward the front on the final corner. If passing toward the back, increase acceleration instead.

uma_musume.name: Mejiro Dober
uma_musume.description: If you keep your calm in the middle of the pack during a Middle or late-race corner, your acceleration will increase.

uma_musume.name: Mejiro McQueen
uma_musume.description: Increase velocity with the determination to not be overtaken when positioned toward the front on the final corner.

uma_musume.name: Mejiro McQueen (Anime)
uma_musume.description: Increase velocity continuously when pressured by another runner and running out of energy toward the front on the final corner or later.

uma_musume.name: Mejiro Ryan
uma_musume.description: Increase acceleration as you attempt to overtake on a corner in the late-race or beyond.

uma_musume.name: Meisho Doto
uma_musume.description: Aim for the front with unwavering determination when passing another runner from midpack or further back on a corner late-race.

uma_musume.name: Mihono Bourbon
uma_musume.description: If you didn't have a late start to the race, and you're in the front during the Final Straight, your speed will increase; bonus speed if you've been in the front for the entire race.

uma_musume.name: Narita Brian
uma_musume.description: If you're passing from the outside during the Final Corner or beyond, your speed will increase; if someone was blocking you from the side during the mid-race, your speed will increase even more.

uma_musume.name: Narita Taishin
uma_musume.description: If you're overtaking someone on the Final Corner or beyond from the middle of the pack, your speed will increase.

uma_musume.name: Nice Nature
uma_musume.description: When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, you gain a little bit more fighting spirit and lightly increase your speed.

uma_musume.name: Oguri Cap
uma_musume.description: Be close to the lead during the last 200m to make it easier to break through and find a way through the field.

uma_musume.name: Rice Shower
uma_musume.description: If you've overtaken another girl in the front during the late-race or beyond, then on the Final Straight, your speed will increase.

uma_musume.name: Rice Shower (Halloween)
uma_musume.description: During the mid-race, if you're in the first half of the pack but aren't in the lead, your speed will slightly increase, your stamina will recover, and you will drain stamina from all enemies ahead of you.

uma_musume.name: Sakura Bakushin O
uma_musume.description: During the later half of the race, your speed increases when competing for the lead.

uma_musume.name: Seiun Sky
uma_musume.description: If you're in the first position on any corner in the late-race or beyond, your acceleration will increase.

uma_musume.name: Silence Suzuka
unique_skills: The View from the Lead Is Mine!
uma_musume.description: If you're in the first position during the second half of the race, your speed will increase.

uma_musume.name: Smart Falcon
uma_musume.description: If you're in the front during a mid-race straight and competing for position, your speed and acceleration will increase.

uma_musume.name: Special Week
uma_musume.description: During the late-race or beyond, if you've overtaken someone in the first half of the pack, your acceleration will slightly increase and you will get a speed boost.

uma_musume.name: Special Week (Summer)
uma_musume.description: During the mid-race, if you activate at least two skills and are in the middle of the pack, your speed will increase and your stamina will recover.

uma_musume.name: Super Creek
uma_musume.description: If you're in a good position in the mid-race, your stamina will recover.

uma_musume.name: Super Creek (Halloween)
uma_musume.description: If you're in front after the final corner and about to overtake another girl, your speed and acceleration will increase.

uma_musume.name: Symboli Rudolf
uma_musume.description: During the late-race of the race make three overtakes to strongly increase your speed on the final straight.

uma_musume.name: Symboli Rudolf (Festival)
uma_musume.description: If someone has been trying to overtake you in the first half of the pack during the late-race or beyond, then on the Final Corner, your speed will increase.

uma_musume.name: T.M. Opera O
uma_musume.description: If you're in the front during the Final Corner or beyond and there's another girl nearby, your speed will increase.

uma_musume.name: Taiki Shuttle
uma_musume.description: If you're in the middle of the pack during the second half of the final corner, your acceleration will increase

uma_musume.name: Tokai Teio
uma_musume.description: If you tried to overtake another girl right in front of you anywhere during the late-race or later, then on the Final Straight, your speed will greatly increase.

uma_musume.name: Tokai Teio (Anime)
uma_musume.description: If you're chasing after another girl in the front during the Final Corner or beyond, your speed on the Final Straight will increase.

uma_musume.name: Tosen Jordan
uma_musume.description: If you're in the front during the Final Straight and you've been trying to overtake someone or someone has been trying to overtake you, your speed will increase.

uma_musume.name: Vodka
uma_musume.description: Increase speed when close to the lead in last 200m

uma_musume.name: Winning Ticket
uma_musume.description: If you're competing for the lead on the Final Corner or beyond, your speed during the Final Straight will increase

uma_musume.name: All Umas/Any Uma
unique_skills: In Your Mind & In Your Love
uma_musume.description: Just believe in yourself and your friends, and your uma will appear here, just kidding~
condition: - Don't trust Tokino Mi- ahh, i mean Tazuna-san.
- 99% gamblers will stop before their big win.
effect: - If you get blocked, ahh ... RNG games ...
